elements.text:
The window list is used to alter the window that
displays the program surface.

title
  The title displayed in the middle of the
  window bar.
x
  The position of the window on the screen on
  the x axis.
y
  The position of the window on the screen on
  the y axis.
width
  The width of the program surface.
height
  The height of the program surface.
icon
  The icon of the window, displayed on the
  taskbar when the program is in full screen
  mode. Requires a userdata gfx code.
tabbed
  Should the program have multiple tabbed
  instances running in parallel. Forces the
  window into full screen mode.
resizeable
 Whether the user can resize the window.
